name: GrimCute
description:
You're a great pharao, entombed after death to be resurrected

when you wake up, the world is a wasteland

there are mutants and enemies everywhere

this is not the paradise of Sekhet-Aaru...

Gather your minions and defend your tomb-palace!

GrimCute is a 2D reverse bullet hell shooter where the player takes on the role of a mummified pharaoh fighting mutants in a post-nuclear-apocalypse wasteland using the cutest Ancient Egyptian Minions possible!

This game was made by students during a project at the MDH Munich.
